attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: and bred people have to abide by all the foreingners rules when they come to our country they chose to come and live here so why should we be called racists and made to do everything their ways they have their beliefs so why cant we have ours this should be the country of freedom of speach not the country of cowards that do not have the goverment to protect them this is wrong that people come to england to expect to live as they did in there own country if we invaded them it would be different whites are all racists according to them we just want to have our rights aswell they are the ones being racist telling us what we can and cant do this is not right we should all live in peace not violence i am proud to be british and proud to be white no one will tell me how to live my life i will not be dictated to there are many of you out there that feel the same please sign this petition to get the goverment to stop letting in immigrants before its to late and ends up being overrun give british people their rights back to speak freely and to live how we used to we were happier stop foreigners using the racism card when they are racists towards us they dont have to live here stop letting so many immigrants in stop them take action now

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
False or incomplete name or address information
